info: The BMW X2 (model code F39) is a subcompact luxury crossover SUV produced by BMW. It was first showcased as the BMW Concept X2 at the 2016 Paris Motor Show,[3] with a production version unveiled in October 2017.[4] Sales commenced in March 2018.[5][6] It is considered a sportier and less practical alternative to the X1, as it is the case with other even-numbered X models with its respective counterparts.[7]
